text: João Emanuel Ferreira Souza (born 17 August 1993), commonly known as Birungueta, is a Brazilian footballer who currently plays as a midfielder for FK Kukësi in the Albanian Superliga.Soccerway profileSambafoot profile ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Albania Category:Expatriate footballers in Albania Category:FK Kukësi players Category:Albanian Superliga players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Birungueta
